entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regular occurrence of `Feature 'Rename' is currently unavailable` error #72036
  • Regular occurrence of `ReplaceMethodWithPropertyCodeRefactoringProvider` error #72035
  • Regular occurrence of `CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider` error #72034
  • Regular occurrence of `CSharpConvertToRecordRefactoringProvider` error #72032
  • "Show potential fixes" does not offer a simple namespace fix #72022
  • Failed assert at AbstractSymbolDisplayService.AbstractSymbolDescriptionBuilder.GetSemanticModel #72020
  • CSharpGoToGlobalImportsTests is flakey #72018
  • Inline Rename currentState is null #72017
  • Unnecessary defensive copies on enums passed by `in` #72016
  • MSBuildWorkspace does not cleanly load blazorwasm project #72015
  • MSBuildWorkspace does not cleanly load VB project on Linux or MacOS #72014

Closed

  • Code analysis generates exceptions non-stop #72024
  • Regular occurrence of `CSharpImplementImplicitlyCodeRefactoringProvider` error #72033
  • The problem with gRPC services #71947
  • VS coloring not working fine after commenting code #72030
  • Roslyn inlay hints provider needs to disable itself when the C# LSP editor is active #72023
  • `GenerateMethodCodeFixProvider` encountered an error and has been disabled #72025
  • [Regression] False positive in nullable analysis of local functions #71419
    17.10
  • Incomplete switch expression with a "case" makes Visual Studio report over ~40+ warnings #71957

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crash in 'replace method with property' when references are in generated parts. #72039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add argument check to help track down a crash #72038
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix crash with convert to record #72037
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add compilation start / stop ETW events #72031
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix crash in 'convert interface impl to implicit/explicit'. #72027
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make getting a frozen partial snapshot async. #72026
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove the AllSyntaxTreesParsed compilation tracker state. #72021
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix null ref in convert-local-function #72029
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Break out the IsFrozen flag to be an aspect of CompilationTrackerState. #71976
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Build bootstrap compiler in separate phase #72001
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in 'remove unreachable code' #72028
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Params parameters are implicitly scoped when their type is a ref struct. #72000
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractFormatEngine.Format #72002
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix some comments in the Workspaces.MSBuild project file #71981
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Only request the necessary document and project in GraphBuilder.PopulateMapsForFileInputNode #71977
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Inline hints - do not produce tags if using lsp editor #71985
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add missing dependencies #72013
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Disable flakey test #72019
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next
  • Break out the IsFrozen flag to be an aspect of CompilationTrackerState. (first commit) #71986
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove hte NoCompilationState singleton, and use 'null' for it instead. #71996
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Modify CpsDiagnosticItemSourceProvider.CreateCollectionSource to be resilient to being passed a disposed hierarchy item. #71991
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce dictionary resizes under NodeMapBuilder.AddToMap #71995
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in ImmutableArrayExtensions.GetTypesFromMemberMap #72003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix invariant-breaking parsing of errant case clauses in switch expressions #71960
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify instantiation of lsp options #72009
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Cache frozen partial solution snapshots acquired off of a solution instance #71999
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Definition items #71959
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined conversions #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Implement control flow graph for Lock object feature #71987
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update taggers to cooperate with each other for accessing the UI thread. #68381
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add async operation listener to allow integration tests to wait for server side operations #70359
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
